name: Climbing in Rzeszów
tagline: Where you can climb in Rzeszów?
body:
### Idea for this page
Here I want collect information about places where you can climb in Rzeszów (Poland).  

### Indoor climbing
In Rzeszów there are three main climbing walls:
* Climbing Wall near Technical University
* Baltoro climbing centre
* Climbing wall near Rzeszów University

### Climbing wall near Technical University (Politechnika Rzeszowska)
Climbing wall has [webpage](http://sciana.prz.rzeszow.pl/english.php) also main info are presented in English. Climbing wall you can find on [Google Maps](http://sciana.prz.rzeszow.pl/jak_dojechac.php). Wall is open from October to June. During Holidays wall is generally closed. Exact days and hours are marked in the schedule. If schedule is empty, wall is probably closed. Wall offers mostly top rope and lead climbing with rope but you can find some place for bouldering.

### Baltoro climbing centre
Baltoro climbing centre is the biggest climbing wall in Rzeszów. Here you can find [wall webpage](http://baltoro.rzeszow.pl). Unfortunately there is no English version and webpage is not always up to date so you should look for more details on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/CentrumWspinaczkoweBaltoroWRzeszowie). Wall offer nice bouldering possibilities, rope climbing and a lot of training accessories like Bachar ladder or campus.

### Climbing wall near Rzeszów University
Climbing wall has no webpage for more info you should visit [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sciankaUR). It's hard to say when wall is open. Schedule is not published and you should probably ask using Facebook. Wall is generally vertical (no overhang) and offers rope climbing.

### Additional info
All the time you can ask me about more details. On [my webpage](http://lojant.idl.pl) you can find email that’s the best way to contact me.

### Mistakes
If you find any mistake or want propose update please let me know. Feel free to open issue for this repository.

Keep climbing!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
